languages.text: Кибелла отдалась чувству, вспыхнувшему между ней и Домин, со страстью на грани греховности. Годы шли, но влечение ее не увядало, как не увядала и ее красота, питаемая ваннами из крови юных дев. Роман этот был полон темных страстей и ревности — не одну жизнь отняла Кибелла по подозрению, что человек этот затмевает ее в глазах Домин. Но кровавые подношения их любви делали ее лишь крепче.

With a passion that bordered on depravity, Kibellah gave in to the feeling that had sparked between her and the Domin. Years passed, but her attraction to the Lord Captain did not fade — and neither did her beauty, nourished by bathing in the blood of young maidens. The affair was ripe with dark passions and jealousy. Kibellah took many a life out of a suspicion that the person was eclipsing her in the Domin's eyes. However, their love was only strengthened by the blood offerings made to it.
languages.original_text: Кибелла отдалась чувству, вспыхнувшему между ней и Домин, со страстью на грани греховности. Годы шли, но влечение ее не увядало, как не увядала и ее красота, питаемая ваннами из крови юных дев. Роман этот был полон темных страстей и ревности — не одну жизнь отняла Кибелла по подозрению, что человек этот затмевает ее в глазах Домин. Но кровавые подношения их любви делали ее лишь крепче.

Kibellah took many a life out of a suspicion that the person was eclipsing her in the Domin's eyes. However, their love was only strengthened by the blood offerings made to it.

languages.text: Mit einer an Sittenlosigkeit grenzenden Leidenschaft gab Kibellah dem Gefühl nach, das zwischen ihr und {mf|ihrem|ihrer} Domin entstanden war. Die Jahre vergingen, aber ihre Hingezogenheit zum Lord Captain blieb ... genau wie ihre Schönheit, die sie durch Bäder im Blut von Jungfrauen pflegte. Die Affäre war geprägt von dunklen Leidenschaften und Eifersucht. Kibellah löschte so manches Leben aus, weil sie der Ansicht war, die Person würde {mf|ihrem|ihrer} Domin schöne Augen machen. Allerdings wurde ihre Liebe durch die Blutopfer, die sie ihr erbrachte, nur gestärkt.
languages.original_text: With a passion that bordered on depravity, Kibellah gave in to the feeling that had sparked between her and the Domin. Years passed, but her attraction to the Lord Captain did not fade — and neither did her beauty, nourished by bathing in the blood of young maidens. The affair was ripe with dark passions and jealousy. Kibellah took many a life out of a suspicion that the person was eclipsing her in the Domin's eyes. However, their love was only strengthened by the blood offerings made to it.

Die Jahre vergingen, aber ihre Hingezogenheit zum Lord Captain blieb ... genau wie ihre Schönheit, die sie durch Bäder im Blut von Jungfrauen pflegte. Die Affäre war geprägt von dunklen Leidenschaften und Eifersucht. Kibellah löschte so manches Leben aus, weil sie der Ansicht war, die Person würde {mf|ihrem|ihrer} Domin schöne Augen machen. Allerdings wurde ihre Liebe durch die Blutopfer, die sie ihr erbrachte, nur gestärkt.

languages.text: Avec une ardeur confinant à la dépravation, Kibellah s'abandonna aux sentiments qui avaient vu le jour entre elle et {mf|son|sa} Domin. Les années passèrent, mais son attirance pour {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} demeura intacte, de même que sa beauté, nourrie par des bains réguliers dans le sang de jeunes vierges. Leur liaison fut marquée par la jalousie et des passions débridées, à tel point que la tisseuse se mit à éliminer systématiquement les rivaux qu'elle soupçonnait de chercher à la supplanter dans le cœur de {mf|son|sa} Domin. Pour autant, leur amour ne fit que se renforcer à la faveur des offrandes de sang versé en son nom.
languages.original_text: With a passion that bordered on depravity, Kibellah gave in to the feeling that had sparked between her and the Domin. Years passed, but her attraction to the Lord Captain did not fade — and neither did her beauty, nourished by bathing in the blood of young maidens. The affair was ripe with dark passions and jealousy. Kibellah took many a life out of a suspicion that the person was eclipsing her in the Domin's eyes. However, their love was only strengthened by the blood offerings made to it.

traits.locale_text: Avec une ardeur confinant à la dépravation, Kibellah s'abandonna aux sentiments qui avaient vu le jour entre elle et {mf|son|sa} Domin. Les années passèrent, mais son attirance pour {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} demeura intacte, de même que sa beauté, nourrie par des bains réguliers dans le sang de jeunes vierges. Leur liaison fut marquée par la jalousie et des passions débridées, à tel point que la tisseuse se mit à éliminer systématiquement les rivaux qu'elle soupçonnait de chercher à la supplanter dans le cœur de {mf|son|sa} Domin. Pour autant, leur amour ne fit que se renforcer à la faveur des offrandes de sang versé en son nom.

languages.text: Con una pasión que rayaba en la depravación, Kibellah se entregó a lo que había surgido entre {mf|el|la} Domin y ella. El paso de los años no hizo nada por reducir su atracción por {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán, ni tampoco su belleza, sustentada al bañarse en la sangre de jóvenes doncellas. El lance era un torbellino de pasiones oscuras y celos. Kibellah se cobró numerosas vidas por la mera sospecha de que la víctima podría eclipsarla ante su Domin. Sin embargo, la sangre derramada solo sirvió para reforzar la relación.
languages.original_text: With a passion that bordered on depravity, Kibellah gave in to the feeling that had sparked between her and the Domin. Years passed, but her attraction to the Lord Captain did not fade — and neither did her beauty, nourished by bathing in the blood of young maidens. The affair was ripe with dark passions and jealousy. Kibellah took many a life out of a suspicion that the person was eclipsing her in the Domin's eyes. However, their love was only strengthened by the blood offerings made to it.

traits.locale_text: Con una pasión que rayaba en la depravación, Kibellah se entregó a lo que había surgido entre {mf|el|la} Domin y ella. El paso de los años no hizo nada por reducir su atracción por {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán, ni tampoco su belleza, sustentada al bañarse en la sangre de jóvenes doncellas. El lance era un torbellino de pasiones oscuras y celos. Kibellah se cobró numerosas vidas por la mera sospecha de que la víctima podría eclipsarla ante su Domin. Sin embargo, la sangre derramada solo sirvió para reforzar la relación.

languages.text: キベラは堕落にも似た情熱で、ドミンとの間に沸き起こった感情に身を任せた。年月が流れたものの、ロード・キャプテンに対する彼女の魅力は…そして若き乙女らの血を浴びることで育まれた彼女の美貌もまた、衰えることはなかった。二人の関係は、ほの暗い情熱と嫉妬に満ちていた。キベラはドミンが目を留めた相手が自分を凌駕するのではないかという疑いから多くの命を奪った。しかし血の捧げものにより、二人の愛はさらに強められた。
languages.original_text: With a passion that bordered on depravity, Kibellah gave in to the feeling that had sparked between her and the Domin. Years passed, but her attraction to the Lord Captain did not fade — and neither did her beauty, nourished by bathing in the blood of young maidens. The affair was ripe with dark passions and jealousy. Kibellah took many a life out of a suspicion that the person was eclipsing her in the Domin's eyes. However, their love was only strengthened by the blood offerings made to it.

traits.locale_text: キベラは堕落にも似た情熱で、ドミンとの間に沸き起こった感情に身を任せた。年月が流れたものの、ロード・キャプテンに対する彼女の魅力は…そして若き乙女らの血を浴びることで育まれた彼女の美貌もまた、衰えることはなかった。二人の関係は、ほの暗い情熱と嫉妬に満ちていた。キベラはドミンが目を留めた相手が自分を凌駕するのではないかという疑いから多くの命を奪った。しかし血の捧げものにより、二人の愛はさらに強められた。

languages.text: 绮贝菈带着近乎堕落的激情，任由自己投身于与行商浪人之间的情爱之中。许多年过去了，她在行商浪人眼里依然是那么迷人。她的身体得到了无数年轻少女鲜血的滋养，美貌没有丝毫衰退。两人之间的爱情充满了阴暗的激情与妒忌，仅仅由于绮贝菈觉得某个人可能会让她黯然失色，她就会不假思索地夺走那个人的性命。不过，两人的爱情纽带却由于无数血祭而变得愈发牢固。
languages.original_text: With a passion that bordered on depravity, Kibellah gave in to the feeling that had sparked between her and the Domin. Years passed, but her attraction to the Lord Captain did not fade — and neither did her beauty, nourished by bathing in the blood of young maidens. The affair was ripe with dark passions and jealousy. Kibellah took many a life out of a suspicion that the person was eclipsing her in the Domin's eyes. However, their love was only strengthened by the blood offerings made to it.

languages.text: Kibellah, ahlaksızlığın hudutlarına dayanan bir tutkuyla Domin'le arasında alevlenen hislere kendini bıraktı. Yıllar geçse de Lord Kaptan'a karşı ilgisi solmadı. Genç kızların kanında yıkanarak beslediği güzelliği de onu terk etmedi. İlişkileri karanlık tutkular ve kıskançlıkla doluydu. Kibellah, Domin'in gözünde kendisine gölge düşüreceğinden kuşkulandığı nice canları aldı. Ancak aşkları, uğruna adanan kan adaklarıyla kuvvetlenmeyi sürdürdü.
languages.original_text: With a passion that bordered on depravity, Kibellah gave in to the feeling that had sparked between her and the Domin. Years passed, but her attraction to the Lord Captain did not fade — and neither did her beauty, nourished by bathing in the blood of young maidens. The affair was ripe with dark passions and jealousy. Kibellah took many a life out of a suspicion that the person was eclipsing her in the Domin's eyes. However, their love was only strengthened by the blood offerings made to it.
